Crimes.Crime_Name: Submitting Incorrect Documentation for Immigration Purposes
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Officer breached procedural fairness or committed an error in law by awarding fewer points for education
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations, SOR/2002-227
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Principal Applicant claimed 19 years of education but only had one recognized post-secondary diploma
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of sufficient recognized years of study
Crimes.Application_Error: Claiming more education points than supported by recognized credentials
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Procedural fairness and correct application of law
Crimes.Application_Factor: Years of education claimed vs. documented credentials
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Applicant's submission of incorrect documentation and failure to meet educational requirements
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Insufficient documentation to support claimed years of education
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Disputed claim of 19 years of education
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Allegation of procedural unfairness or legal error

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Officer breached procedural fairness or committed an error in law regarding education points
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations, SOR/2002-227
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Principal Applicant claimed 19 years of education but only had one recognized post-secondary diploma
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of recognized credentials to support claimed education
Crimes.Application_Error: Claiming higher education points without sufficient recognized credentials
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Application dismissed; question certified on point allocation under Regulation 78(4)
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Procedural fairness and correct interpretation of regulations
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Principal Applicantâ€™s claim for higher education points was disputed due to lack of recognized credentials
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to provide sufficient evidence of 19 years of recognized education
Crimes.Document_Fraud: False representation through inflated education claims
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Inconsistency between claimed and documented education
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Fairness in evaluation of educational claims
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to submit verifiable educational records
